document.discussion_title: Pieces Tech Announces Strategic Initiative with Baylor Scott & White Health
document.topic_text: Pieces Tech Announces Strategic Initiative with Baylor Scott & White Health Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 43 minutes ago ) DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--#bigdata--Pieces Technologies today announced a major strategic initiative with Baylor Scott & White Health (BSWH) to deploy its Pieces™ Decision Support software. Additionally, BSWH has invested in Pieces Tech’s recently announced Series A, providing a multi-hospital environment for further expansion, incubation and development of Pieces™ software and services. “Baylor Scott & White Health is one of the most innovative health care systems in the United States, with inspi
document.post: Pieces Tech Announces Strategic Initiative with Baylor Scott & White Health Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 43 minutes ago ) DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--#bigdata--Pieces Technologies today announced a major strategic initiative with Baylor Scott & White Health (BSWH) to deploy its Pieces™ Decision Support software.
